Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{3: 'You double-check the address one last time.'}
{3: '"Secret plan in preparation..." The email has only this line, along with coordinates in Constellia.'}
{3: 'Signed with a panda clutching bamboo.'}
{3: "You just know Pulao's cooking up another scheme."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Pulao's voice reverberates through the streets."}
{3: "Unlike the sprawling art galleries in Constellia, this place is clearly a shopping street akin to Babylonia's commercial district."}
{3: 'Though there are no signs hanging around, spots have been reserved.'}
{3: 'Glancing toward Pulao, you see two familiar faces, or rather, three.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Changyu and Sophia are talking with someone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Shhh—the Little League is in the middle of a business negotiation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is something hindering the secret plan?', 3: '24'}
{3: 'You gaze toward the one talking to Changyu, who seems to be an ordinary mechanoid.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'Spreading culture is very important!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hi—', 3: '32', 4: 'A lot seems to be going on here.', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Hi, 【kuroname】, you're here.", 4: '3'}
{2: "So, what's the situation now?", 3: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'They\'re from a Constellia organization called the "World Folklore Enthusiast Association".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Hoping to join Little League's Valentine's Day-themed fair.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I came up with that idea! We booked the entire shopping street for it!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "But they want to set the plaza as their event space, which means we won't be able to set up stalls there.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Because Pulao went ahead and booked the entire shopping street all by herself, we must add more stalls to be profitable.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: "Holding an event right in the central district would do wonders for raising public awareness and deepening people's understanding of Kowloong folklore!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Club Member', 3: 'And after my meticulous calculations, this is the best place to hold the event!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We paid a lot for this.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This place is indeed perfect for playing...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Whose side are you on...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'We can only spare one stall for you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'If you need more, we can offer you a discount on the stall rental fee.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'Dammit, do I really have to resort to that move?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The association member suddenly pulls out a stack of cards bearing the Constellia emblem and a heavy bag.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: "It's part of our tradition—using this to place bets.", 4: '2'}
{2: "I think it's about guessing the next card's value to determine the winner—", 3: '77'}
{3: 'It suddenly occurs to you that there was an association like this last year that...'}
{2: 'Association Member', 3: "You seem to know us well! Good prep work there! So, if I win, we get to host our event here, but if I lose, we'll leave immediately!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's already booked by the Little League. There's no reason for us to accept any challenges.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Yeah, a fact is a fact. There's no winning or losing here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "But what's this?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao opens the heavy bag.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "As soon as it's opened, a radiant silver glow emanates, unveiling a full bag of coins adorned with special patterns."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Wow! I want this! Give it to me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I have decided to accept the challenge!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'We should settle this with an internal vote. I object.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'If we lose, you can have the Moonlit Coins we specifically made for the event.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Commemorative coins, huh?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Maybe there's a win-win solution?", 3: '107'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'I expect nothing less from you, 【kuroname】. Care if you join forces with us?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'Hmm?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We can provide the venue for your event, but you must charge an entrance fee. How about a sixty-forty split for the profits, with us taking the sixty?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'As for the card game, all transactions today will be exclusively done with the Moonlit Coins.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'People can only get their hands on those commemorative coins by winning the card game, which makes it another source of income.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'Hmm...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What are they talking about?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao tugs at the corner of your clothes and asks quietly.'}
{2: 'They are negotiating.', 3: '128', 4: 'They are discussing.', 5: '128'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: "I don't have any problem with that. Deal!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Club Member', 3: 'Besides, considering the size of the street and the lack of settled vendors, we can offer some additional manpower.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "But don't expect us to pay much.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Association Member', 3: 'We are willing to make a contribution to cultural research.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Then, we can start preparing now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Speaking of which, Commandant, would you like to be the first to try this game? Feel free to bring along someone you like.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'And you can pay for the entry fee with your advice.', 4: '3'}
